C D E G I M N O P R S T W

C

changeToByte(int) - Method in class net.Network
 
connect(String) - Method in class net.Network
Just as Network.connect(String, int), but using 115200 bps as a default speed of the connection.
connect(String, int) - Method in class net.Network
Opening a connection to the specified Serial port, using the specified speed.
connected - Variable in class net.Network
The status of the connection.
contact - Variable in class net.Network
Link to the instance of the class implementing Network_iface.

D

disconnect() - Method in class net.Network
Simple function closing the connection held by this instance of Network.
divider - Variable in class net.Network
A small int representing the number to be used to distinguish between two consecutive packages.

E

end - Variable in class net.Network
Communicating between threads, showing the Network.reader when the connection has been closed, so it can Thread.join().
Example - Class in net
This is a very simple example showing the most basic use of Network and Network_iface.
Example() - Constructor for class net.Example
 

G

getPortList() - Method in class net.Network
This method is used to get a list of all the available Serial ports (note: only Serial ports are considered).

I

id - Variable in class net.Network
int identifying the specific instance of the Network-class.
in - Variable in class net.Network.SerialReader
 
inputStream - Variable in class net.Network
 
isConnected() - Method in class net.Network
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class net.Example
 

N

net - package net
Generalized package containing the interface to the network (over serial).
network - Static variable in class net.Example
 
Network - Class in net
Used to simplify communication over a Serial port.
Network(int, Network_iface, int) - Constructor for class net.Network
 
Network(int, Network_iface) - Constructor for class net.Network
Just as Network.Network(int, Network_iface, int), but with a default Network.divider of 255.
Network(Network_iface) - Constructor for class net.Network
Just as Network.Network(int, Network_iface, int), but with a default Network.divider of 255 and a default Network.id of 0.
Network.SerialReader - Class in net
A separate class to use as the Network.reader.
Network.SerialReader(InputStream) - Constructor for class net.Network.SerialReader
 
Network_iface - Interface in net
An instance of a class implementing this interface has to be passed to the constructor of Network.
networkDisconnected(int) - Method in class net.Example
Implementing networkDisconnected(int), which is called when the connection has been closed.
networkDisconnected(int) - Method in interface net.Network_iface
Is called when the network has been disconnected.
numTempBytes - Variable in class net.Network
 
numTotBytes - Variable in class net.Network
 

O

outputStream - Variable in class net.Network
 

P

parseInput(int, int, int[]) - Method in class net.Example
Implementing parseInput(int, int, int[]) to handle messages received over the serial port.
parseInput(int, int, int[]) - Method in interface net.Network_iface
Is called when sequence of bytes are received over the Serial interface.

R

reader - Variable in class net.Network
The Thread used to receive the data from the Serial interface.
resend_active - Static variable in class net.Example
 
run() - Method in class net.Network.SerialReader
 

S

serialPort - Variable in class net.Network
 
speed - Static variable in class net.Example
 

T

tempBytes - Variable in class net.Network
 

W

writeLog(int, String) - Method in class net.Example
Implementing writeLog(int, String), which is used to write information concerning the connection.
writeLog(int, String) - Method in interface net.Network_iface
Is called to write connection information to the log.
writeSerial(String) - Method in class net.Network
This method is included as a legacy.
writeSerial(int, int[]) - Method in class net.Network
If a connection is open, an int between 0 and 255 (except the Network.divider) can be sent over the Serial port using this function.
